I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.

content.text: I'm currently touring with Frank Ocean. I'm really excited about it, but I'm also a little bit nervous.
I'm sure you'll do great! What kind of music does Frank Ocean play?
He plays a mixture of R&B and soul music. It's really good stuff.
I don't think I've ever heard of him before. Do you have any songs you could recommend?
Sure, I can send you a few links.
Thanks! I'll check them out. I'm not much of a music person, but I'm always willing to try new things.
No problem. I'm sure you'll like his music.
What do you like to do for fun when you're not touring?
I like to relax and watch movies. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
Sounds like you have a good life.
I do, thanks. I'm very grateful for everything I have.
That's great to hear.
How about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing along to country music with my fiancé on the weekends. I also enjoy tinkering with my car in the garage.
That sounds like fun. I'm not much of a mechanic, but I can appreciate a good car.
Thanks. I like to keep it in good shape.
That's important.
Yeah, I don't want to have any problems with it.
I can understand that.
I'm also an animal rights activist.
That's great! I'm a big animal lover myself.
Me too. I think they're amazing creatures.
I agree. They're so intelligent and curious.
They're also very loving and affectionate.
I know, right? I love animals so much.
Me too
